item.title: Using rootless podman in ChromeOS/Crostini/Debian 10
item.description: First things first: You will have to become root once every termina reboot Following the install instructions at https://podman.io/getting-started/installation you will probably run into this error podman run --rm 2f4357dd9647 /bin/echo "fubar" Error: mount `proc` to `/proc`: Operation not permitted: OCI permission denied Why is that? Because there are lxcfs mount points below /proc findmnt -R /proc TARGET SOURCE FSTYPE OPTIONS /proc proc proc rw,nosuid,nodev,noexec,relatime ├─/proc/cpuinfo lxcfs[/proc/cpuinfo] fuse.lxcfs rw,nosuid,nodev,relatime,user_id=0,group_id=0,allow_other ├─/proc/diskstats lxcfs[/proc/diskstats] fuse.
